TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OdbcConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcConnectionStringBuilder Inherits DbConnectionStringBuilder

summary.span: 为创建和管理由 类使用的连接字符串的内容提供了一种简单方法。

span.span: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接字符串生成器，开发人员以编程方式创建语法正确的连接字符串和分析并重新生成现有的连接字符串使用属性和类的方法。The connection string builders let developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class. 连接字符串生成器提供强类型化的已知的键/值对相对应的属性允许的 ODBC 连接和开发人员可以添加任意键/值对的任何其他连接字符串值。The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by ODBC connections, and developers can add arbitrary key/value pairs for any other connection string values. 需要在应用程序中创建连接字符串的开发人员可以使用 类生成和修改连接字符串。Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the class to build and modify connection strings. 使用该类还可以轻松管理存储在应用程序配置文件中的连接字符串。The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file. 仅为一组有限的已知的键/值对执行检查。 performs checks only for the limited set of known key/value pairs. 因此，此类可用于创建无效的连接字符串。Therefore, this class can be used to create invalid connection strings. 下表列出了特定的已知的键以及它们中的相应属性类和其默认值。The following table lists the specific known keys together with their corresponding properties within the class, and their default values. 除了这些特定的值，开发人员可以将任何键/值对添加到集合中包含实例。Besides these specific values, developers can add any key/value pairs to the collection that is contained within the instance. |键Key|PropertyProperty|注释Comment|默认值Default value| |---------|--------------|-------------|-------------------| |驱动程序Driver||开发人员不应包含这些设置时两边的驱动程序名称的大括号属性。Developers should not include the braces surrounding the driver name when they set the property. 实例根据需要添加大括号。The instance adds braces as needed.|空字符串Empty string| |DSNDSN|||空字符串Empty string| 如果任何值 (而不值) 在连接字符串包含以分号 （;），包围括在引号中的连接字符串的值。If any value (other than the value) within the connection string contains a semicolon (;), the surrounds the value with quotation marks in the connection string. 为了避免这一问题值，该值通常包含一个分号，类一律会用此值与大括号。In order to avoid this issue with the value that frequently contains a semicolon, the class always surrounds this value with braces. ODBC 规范指示用大括号，括起来的驱动程序的值包含分号，此类可以帮助您处理。The ODBC specification indicates that driver values that contain semicolons must be surrounded with braces, and this class handles this for you. 属性处理插入恶意代码的尝试。The property handles attempts to insert malicious code. 例如，下面的代码使用默认属性 （C# 中的索引器） 正确转义嵌套的键/值对。For example, the following code, using the default property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair. ```vb Dim builder As _ New System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder ' Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server" builder("Server") = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad" Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` ```csharp System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder(); // Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server"; builder["Server"] = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad"; Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` 结果为以下连接字符串，该字符串以安全方式处理无效值：The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` Driver={SQL Server};Server="MyServer;NewValue=Bad" ``` ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序生成多个 ODBC 数据库的连接字符串。The following console application builds connection strings for several ODBC databases. 首先，该示例创建一个 Microsoft Access 数据库的连接字符串。First, the example creates a connection string for a Microsoft Access database. 然后，创建 IBM DB2 数据库的连接字符串。It then creates a connection string for an IBM DB2 database. 该示例还分析现有的连接字符串，并演示了操作的连接字符串的内容的各种方法。The example also parses an existing connection string, and demonstrates various ways of manipulating the contents of the connection string. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The basis for the object's internal connection information.
Parsed into key/value pairs.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 所提供的连接字符串为实例的内部连接信息提供数据。

span.span: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以传入构造函数中，连接字符串，也可以设置属性显式。You can pass a connection string in the constructor, or you can set the property explicitly. 行为是相同的两种方式。The behavior is the same either way. ## Examples 下面的示例创建多个情况下，将不同的连接字符串传递给每个用例中的构造函数。The following example creates multiple instances, passing a different connection string to the constructor in each case. 请注意，连接字符串内的元素的顺序可能会修改在检索时属性。Note that the ordering of elements within the connection string may be modified when you retrieve the property. 另请注意预定义的"Dsn"和"Driver"键以外的键被转换为小写的类。Also note that keys other than the predefined "Dsn" and "Driver" keys are converted to lowercase by the class. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 连接字符串的格式错误（可能是键/值对中缺少必需的“=”）。

span.span: The connection string is incorrectly formatted (perhaps missing the required "=" within a key/value pair).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中移除所有键/值对，从并将重置和为其默认值的属性。The method removes all key/value pairs from the and resets the and properties to their default values. 方法还会设置属性设为 0 和属性为空字符串。The method also sets the property to 0 and the property to an empty string. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Driver { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Driver : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与连接关联的 ODBC 驱动程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the ODBC driver associated with the connection.

value.span: 属性的值；或如果未提供任何值，则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在您尝试设置此属性时传入的值为 null，则将重置 属性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果未设置值，而开发人员尝试检索该属性的返回值是`String.Empty`。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 此属性对应于连接字符串内的"Driver"键。This property corresponds to the "Driver" key within the connection string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在您尝试设置此属性时传入的值为 null，则将重置 属性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果未设置值，而开发人员尝试检索该属性的返回值是`String.Empty`。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 此属性对应于连接字符串内的"Dsn"键。This property corresponds to the "Dsn" key within the connection string.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool TryGetValue (string keyword, out object value);

Public Overrides Function TryGetValue (keyword As String, ByRef value As Object) As Boolean
public: override bool TryGetValue(System::String ^ keyword, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % value);

span.span: The key of the item to retrieve.

param.name: value
param.span: 与 keyword 相对应的值。

span.span: The value corresponding to keyword.

summary.span: 从此 中检索与所提供的键对应的值。

span.span: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this .

returns.span: 如果在连接字符串中找到 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if was found within the connection string; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许开发人员安全地从 中检索值，而无需验证提供的键名是否为有效的键名。The method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name. 因为不会引发异常时传入不存在的键时，不需要检索其值之前查找键。Because does not raise an exception when you pass in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value. 调用不存在的键将放置值为 null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 中`value`参数。Calling with a nonexistent key places the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的行为方法。The following example demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/VB/source.vb#1)]
